title: The Goblin's Gambit
description: A classic D&D adventure where brave adventurers must infiltrate a goblin-infested cave to rescue kidnapped villagers and retrieve stolen treasures.

tavern_start.description: The Rusty Dragon Tavern - A cozy establishment filled with the smell of ale and roasted meat. The innkeeper, Ameiko, looks worried as she approaches you with urgent news about missing villagers.

auto_quests.name: Rescue the Villagers
auto_quests.description: Three villagers were kidnapped by goblins last night. Find them and bring them home safely.

town_investigation.description: The village streets are quiet. You investigate the kidnapping scene near the eastern gate. Goblin tracks lead into the forest, and you find a torn piece of cloth with the village blacksmith's emblem.

forest_path.description: The Whispering Woods - Ancient trees loom overhead as you follow the goblin tracks deeper into the forest. You hear strange chittering sounds ahead and spot movement in the bushes.

hidden_grove.description: A peaceful grove with a small shrine to the forest deity. An old hermit emerges from meditation, offering cryptic advice about the goblin chief's weakness to fire.

cave_entrance.description: The cave entrance yawns before you like a monstrous maw. Crude goblin totems flank the entrance, and you can smell the acrid stench of goblin cooking fires from within. Two goblin guards stand watch, looking bored.

sneak_entrance.description: You discover a narrow side passage partially hidden by vines. It's tight but passable, leading deeper into the cave system while avoiding the main guards.

cave_tunnels.description: Winding tunnels carved from stone, lit by flickering torches. You hear the echo of goblin voices and the clanking of chains. Multiple passages branch off in different directions.

prisoner_chamber.description: A dank cell where three frightened villagers are chained to the wall. A single goblin jailer sleeps in the corner, keys dangling from his belt. The prisoners' eyes widen with hope as they see you.

escape_route.description: A narrow escape passage the villagers know about. It leads back toward the forest, but you hear goblin war drums from deeper in the cave - the chief knows you're here.

goblin_throne_room.description: The throne room of Grax the Cruel, goblin chieftain. Piles of stolen treasure surround a crude throne made of bones and scrap metal. Grax himself is a large, scarred goblin wearing mismatched armor, flanked by his elite guards. He grins wickedly as you enter.

treasure_vault.description: Hidden behind the throne is a small vault containing the goblins' accumulated plunder. Ancient coins, jewelry, and magical trinkets lie scattered about. You also find the village's tax collection that was stolen last month.

victory.description: You emerge from the cave victorious! The villagers are safe, the treasure is recovered, and the goblin threat is ended. The village celebrates your heroism with a grand feast at the Rusty Dragon Tavern. Ameiko raises a toast in your honor!
